meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a scirrhus.
meanings.sent1: The scirrhoid growth on the tree bark felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: Her scirrhoid skin had a tough and leathery texture.
meanings.sent3: The scirrhoid rock in the garden seemed to be playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The scirrhoid clouds in the sky looked like hardened cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The scirrhoid scar on his arm was a reminder of the accident.

meanings.sent1: The doctor discovered a scirrhoid in the patient's lung during the examination.
meanings.sent2: The scirrhoid was causing discomfort and needed immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The scirrhoid tumor decided to throw a party in the body, but nobody was invited.
meanings.sent4: The scirrhoid grew like a stubborn weed in the garden of the body.
meanings.sent5: The scirrhoid tumor was as unwelcome as a storm on a sunny day.
